title: Tuchel Says No to Ronaldo
description:
The FC crew react to reports that Thomas Tuchel has ruled out a possible transfer for Cristiano Ronaldo as the Portuguese striker doesn't fit the free flowing attacking that the Chelsea manager wants next season. Plus, Julien Laurens joins the show to discuss Neymar's future at PSG and why Manchester United haven't made any summer signings yet.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Tuchel rules out Cristiano Ronaldo transfer; Chelsea turn to Nathan Ake deal; Messi wants Neymar to stay at PSG
